OSGi distribution package builder
Last Published: 2016-08-18  | Version: 0.0.2
OSGi distribution package builder
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

osgi-dp:build

Full name:

de.dentrassi.maven:osgi-dp:0.0.2:build

Description:

Build an OSGi distribution package from an Eclipse Feature

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: compile.
  • Requires dependency collection of artifacts in scope: compile.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: package.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
attach boolean - (no description)
Default value is: true.
skip boolean - (no description)
Default value is: false.
User property is: osgi-dp.skip.
useQualifiedFilename boolean - (no description)
Default value is: true.

Parameter Details

attach:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

skip:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: osgi-dp.skip
  • Default: false

useQualifiedFilename:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: true
